attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The title says it all. Build more prisons Mr Blair and New Labour. This country is a nanny state, a laughing stock in the international community with our policy of pampering criminals. Instead of pampering the prisoners, lets punish the prisoners. Less New Labour and more Hard Labour

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
